Event.MetaDescription: South Indian Society presents monthly satsang for October 2012 in London.
Event.Maindescription:
SIS Monthly Satsang - October 2012

Events

3.00 p.m : Vishnu Sahasranamam
3.20 p.m : Lalitha Sahasranamam
3:40 p.m : Bhajans
4:00 p.m : Spiritual Talk
4:15 p.m : Aarathi and Prasadam

Please RSVP by sending an e-mail to sisnambalava@gmail.com or calling Mrs. Lakshmi Rajagopalan on 020 8907 7184 by 4th October
